RelatedSentence: Dominican officials have been criticized as xenophobic and racist since a high court ruling last year that stated children born in the country to undocumented immigrants were not automatically entitled to citizenship .
The court ordered the civil registry to audit birth records dating back to 1929 , stripping documentation from those who did not qualify , even if they had previously been issued papers .
